PAD_Shadowheart.synopsis: Shadowheart has sudden, mysterious hunch and is compelled to investigate a side area in the Temple of Shar. (this is an unconscious prompt from somewhere in her memory - entering the side area will trigger a flashback scene from her past).

PAD_Shadowheart_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_Shadowheart_0.text: Through there... there's something about it. Need to look.
